name: Act 1 Scene 1
derscription: ดูวีดีโอ ครบ 20 นาที

name: Express Yourself
derscription: ปรับแต่งรูปและข้อมูลโปรไฟล์

name: Picking Up Steam
derscription: Quickly & correctly answer 5 skill problems in a row (time limit depends on skill difficulty)

name: Just Getting Started
derscription: Achieve mastery in 3 unique skills

name: Inspiration
derscription: Another user created a program based on one of yours

name: Brain Builder
derscription: You finished your first brain fitness test. Great job!

name: Making Progress
derscription: Achieve mastery in 7 unique skills

name: Good Habits
derscription: Watch part of any video or work on any skill each day for 5 consecutive days

name: Flag Duty
derscription: Flag your first discussion post on a video or program for a Guardian's attention

name: Thumbs Up
derscription: Cast your first up vote for a helpful discussion post or program

name: Thumbs Down
derscription: Cast your first down vote for an unhelpful discussion post or program

name: Evaluator
derscription: Evaluate a student's project

name: Researcher
derscription: Reference a timestamp when answering a question on a video or program

name: Bibliographer
derscription: Reference a timestamp when asking a question on a video or program

name: You Can Learn Anything
derscription: You only have to know one thing -- You can learn anything. Join the movement.

name: Ten to the Fourth
derscription: Earn 10,000 energy points

name: Inspired 15 Minutes
derscription: Correctly answer 10 problems and watch 10 minutes of video in 15 minutes

name: Express Yourself
derscription: Customize your profile avatar and fill up your display case

name: Persistence
derscription: Answer a problem correctly after having some trouble with a few problems and sticking with the skill

name: Nice Streak
derscription: Correctly answer 20 problems in a row in a single skill

name: Cypress
derscription: Remain a member of Khan Academy for 1 yearl

name: Nice Listener
derscription: Watch 15 minutes of video in a single topic

name: Great Listener
derscription: Watch 30 minutes of video in a single topic

name: Challenger
derscription: Complete a Computer Science Challenge

derscription: Quickly & correctly answer 20 skill problems in a row (time limit depends on skill difficulty)

name: Good Inspiration
derscription: Other users created 10 programs based on one of yours

name: 1000 Kelvin
derscription: Have a red-hot program at the top of the Community Programs list

name: Brain Bonanza
derscription: By taking the same brain fitness test several times, you are watching yourself learn!

name: Productive
derscription: Achieve mastery in 15 unique skills

name: Hard at Work
derscription: Achieve mastery in 25 unique skills

name: Geek of the week: practice

name: Power Hour
derscription: Correctly answer 90 problems and watch 15 minutes of video in 1 hour
